content:
It’s been a fortnight since football in England was brought to an abrupt halt – and we’re truly missing it like mad!
In the Premier League, it had been a cracking campaign up to that point, with Jurgen Klopp’s rampant Liverpool side running away with the tit… [+15180 chars]
